name: Sangeeta Darvekar Charitable Trust
briefDescription: We are a leading NGO working on Mouth Cancer Awareness due to tobacco use.We also run an ESDOT project which means Ecologically sustainable development of tribals at Gholvad, Dist Thane. Under this project we are conducting free medical camps and are conducting free computer education center.GuideStar India url is http://www.guidestarindia.org/Summary.aspx?CCReg=926our website url is http://www.oralcancerawareness.org/
